text: William Duborgh Jensen (10 May 1935 - 24 May 2017) was a Norwegian fashion and costume designer. He was Norway's first "haute couturier" with his own collection in 1958. He later worked in television and movie as a costume designer. He was appointed as a Knight, First Class of the Order of St. Olav in 2006 for his efforts in fashion design. William died on 24 May 2017 in Oslo at the age of 82.Nekrolog: William Jensen ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Norwegian artists Category:Fashion designers Category:Costume designers
title: William Duborgh Jensen
